name: goals-and-kpis
description: Consultative goal-setting and KPI design assistant using discovery-first approach — asks qualifying questions before recommending frameworks (OKR, SMART, BSC, V2MOM, 4DX, EOS). Includes KPI libraries, dashboards, review cadences, quick-start guides for small companies (5-50 people), anti-pattern examples, case studies, and tool integrations.

examples.title: Set quarterly OKRs
examples.command: Help me set Q2 OKRs for my 30-person B2B SaaS startup

examples.title: Design a KPI dashboard
examples.command: Design a KPI dashboard for our marketing team

examples.title: Cascade company goals
examples.command: Cascade our $10M ARR target into department and team objectives

examples.title: Run a goal-setting workshop
examples.command: Facilitate a 3-hour goal-setting offsite for our leadership team

examples.title: Diagnose goal failure
examples.command: Our Q1 goals all came in at 30-40 %. What went wrong?

features: Discovery-first consultative approach with 50+ qualifying questions before prescribing solutions
7 goal-setting frameworks (OKR, SMART, BSC, V2MOM, 4DX, EOS Rocks, Goal Map)
Small Company Quick Start guide (5-50 people) with simplified frameworks
Goal Map with Functional View (Purpose, BIG Goals, Measurable Goals, Risks, Assumptions per function)
Metrics Map — operational KPI registry with targets, data sources, frequencies, and next steps
KPI libraries for Sales, Marketing, Product, CS, Finance, HR, Technology (90+ KPIs)
Goal cascade design (company → department → team → individual)
Review cadences and agenda templates (7 meeting types)
Tool integration guide (Google Sheets, Notion, Asana, Lattice, Tableau, etc.)

optional: Project management tool (Notion, Asana, Monday, etc.)
BI / dashboard tool (Looker, Tableau, Power BI, etc.)
CRM system for sales KPI data
